articles.author: James Polson
articles.title: Postecoglou out of Champions League after Socceroo breaks Celtic hearts - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Celtic have again surrendered a lead and will miss out on Europe’s top competition for a fourth straight year with attention now turning to the domestic campaign.
articles.content:
Ange Postecoglous first major test as Celtic manager has ended in heartbreak after a 2-1 loss to Danish side FC Midtjylland.

articles.title: Fully vaccinated Canadians excluded from new U.K. quarantine exception rules - Global News
articles.description: The U.K. announced Wednesday that fully vaccinated travellers in the U.S. or Europe will not have to quarantine on arrival to the country.
articles.content:
Fully vaccinated Canadian travellers have been left out of plans to ease quarantine restrictions for entry to England and Scotland.
